text: Anoop Gupta (born Sitapur, Uttar Pradesh 15 July 1969) is an Indian legislator who represents the constituency of Maholi, Sitapur city, Uttar Pradesh as a member of the state legislative assembly. He is a member of the socialist Samajwadi Party, and the son of Sitapur politician Om Prakash Gupta. ==References== Category:Uttar Pradesh politicians Category:1969 births Category:Living people
title: Anoop Gupta
